column5: I've done a search on this and have found a few references.Anyone ever been to Ballard's Black Island Resort on Lake of the Woods out of Monson Ontario?Would appreciate your general opinion on the fishing and whether or not it was worth the expense etc.Many thanks in advance.

Benny, Have never stayed at Black Island Resort, but have fished the area extensively. Fishing for all species is generally good to excellent. The waters near to Big Black Island has ben one of our staples for good walleye fishing on our spring and fall trips to LOTW. Hope someone else can tell you about the resort.

I stayed there about four times under the previous owners. I liked the place but would probably look at Obabikon Lodge or one of the lodges located in the back of Miles Bay if I were to visit that area again. Got caught crossing some big water in the wind there while the other places were located right on top of the best fishing in my opinion.
Just watched an episode of Due North Outdoors on Fox Sports North. They typically reply the same episode all week. Check your guide and maybe you can DVR it.
